name: civicchain-db-scripts
description: Database population scripts for CivicChain application

scripts.test-connection: node -e "require('./populateDatabaseEnhanced.js').testApiConnection().then(result => console.log('Connection test:', result ? 'SUCCESS' : 'FAILED')).catch(err => console.error('Connection test FAILED:', err.message))"
